reviews.review: 游戏性真的不错，个人也是看了别人的推荐买的，完全不亏，无论是玩法还是剧情，都非常的不错，好评!!!!!!!!
This is one of the most amusing games I have played. A truly worthy sequel.
Одна из любимых игр по вселенной Half Life
游戏玩法不错，双人玩真的很搞笑，两个机器人真的好可爱！玩的很来玩！
интересная игра, убивает время. Ставлю оценку класс

早期神作名不虚传！设计的很有意思，方式很讨巧，很神秘。解密不算太难，也不简单 
合作模式的关卡还是很多的，拉上朋友一起玩  杀时间
i like how free it feels yet so far away
Занимательная игра для 2 игроков в кооперативе и не плохая сюжетка.
Segunda parte del tan aclamado portal muy buena 100% recomendado
É PORTAIS E MAIS PORTAIS MUITO LOUCOS
круто загатки плюс гуеймплэй крутой короче головоломка круто
It's still great to this day
It's famous for a reason, and the graphics are way better than I expected. I could play the community test chambers for hours. Definitely recommend.
Muito bom o jogo, pode-se passar horas e horas jogando com amigos sem enjoar
很特別的遊戲，不同於一般遊戲的線性思考，此款遊戲就像把紙上的智力測驗做成動作遊戲，有時候不知道路時，需要用力觀察周邊可以產生傳送門的地方，然後道路就這樣無中生有出來了。

Portal 2 is way much better than the first. You don't need to play the first to understand the 2nd game.
Great puzzles, great story and great voice acting.

Now. Where's half life 3?

A timeless classic. 

Great story paired with excellent puzzles

It's awesome, I like puzzle games with plot.
Me parece divertido el tema de poder meterse por portales y hacer puzzles. Recomendado (Se necesita sabe algo de Ingles)

Just good relaxing entertainment for all hours.

- Definitely worth a try solo or a great game to play with a co-op friend. Delivers a mix of easy to mind bending puzzles , hilarity and frustration awaits you. Followed by a sense of accomplishment when you manage to finish a level using all tools available to you and your teammate. At its current price it's a steal so why not give it a try with a mate.
Juego bastante entretenido, mas que el 1. espero un 3er juego
i really like this game its fun
Kafası çalışmayan oynamasın aq oynasada yorumlamasın.
评价方未及时做出评价，系统默认好评！
Gran historia, comedia y puzzles. El problema es el modo Coop, que o tiene amigos que lo tengan, o lo tienes crudo.

Look, this game is on sale right now for only a dollar. If you dont own this game already, there are probably some aspects of your life that just arent working. BUY IT. Even when the sale ends, itll only be 10 bucks, so needless to say, it may be the best game on the planet for the price, maybe even for any price. The game play is phenomenal and the story is better than the first. The characters are so funny and they never get old to listen to. 10/10 would buy again.
Lots of fun, community chambers add a lot of content to the game and makes it very replayable.
